docs.title: Jelajah Nusantara API Documentation
docs.text:
In this documentation you will find all the information you need to use the Jelajah Nusantara API.

Jika ingin melihat versi web dari aplikasi ini, silahkan kunjungi Jelajah Nusantara.

 https://capstone-project-api-ch2-ps352.et.r.appspot.com/web

docs.title: Base URL
docs.text:
Endpoint Base URL: Beta Testing

https://api-beta-testing.uc.r.appspot.com/

Endpoint Base URL: Production

https://capstone-project-api-ch2-ps352.et.r.appspot.com/

docs.title: Auth
docs.text: This page auth

docs.title: Endpoint list post
docs.text: Method Endpoint Description GET /api/posts Get all posts. POST /api/posts Create a new post. PUT /api/posts/:id Update an existing post. Only the user who created the post can update it. GET /api/posts/:id Retrieve information about a specific post. DELETE /api/posts/:id Delete an existing post. Only the user who created the post can delete it.

docs.title: Endpoint list user
docs.text: Method Endpoint Description GET /api/users Get all users. GET /api/users/:id Retrieve information about a specific post.

docs.title: About Jelajah Nusantara API
docs.text:
Jelajah Nusantara Social Media API is a RESTful service tailored for providing and sharing information about tourist attractions in Indonesia.

This API integrates seamlessly with various social media platforms, fostering community engagement and interaction around the enchanting tourist destinations in the archipelago.

Explore Indonesia's beauty, share your experiences, and connect with fellow travelers through the Jelajah Nusantara Social Media.

docs.title: Technology Stack:
docs.text:
• Node.js
  • Express.js
  • Firebase

docs.title: Jelajah Nusantara Aplikasi Web
docs.text: This endpoint

docs.title: Base URL
docs.text: https://capstone-project-api-ch2-ps352.et.r.appspot.com/web

docs.title: Try it out
docs.text: Jika anda melakukan login dengan google dan halaman stack di callback makan ada tinggal kembali ke halaman ini https://capstone-project-api-ch2-ps352.et.r.appspot.com/web. dan anda di nyatakan sudah login.

docs.title: Deskripsi
docs.text: Endpoint ini digunakan untuk menginisialisasi proses autentikasi OAuth dengan Google.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text: GET /auth/google

docs.title: Code
docs.text:
app.get(
    "/auth/google",
    passport.authenticate("google", { scope: ["profile", "email"] })
);

docs.title: Deskripsi
docs.text: Setelah autentikasi berhasil dengan Google, callback ini dijalankan untuk menangani data pengguna yang telah diotentikasi.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text: GET /auth/google/callback

docs.title: Code
docs.text:
app.get("auth/google/callback", passport.authenticate("google"), (req, res) => {
    // Setelah autentikasi berhasil, token dapat diambil dari req.user.token
    const accessToken = req.user.accessToken;

    // Lakukan sesuatu dengan token, misalnya, kirimkan kembali ke klien Android
    res.json({ success: true, token: accessToken, user: req.user });
});

docs.title: Deskripsi
docs.text: Endpoint ini digunakan untuk menangani kasus kegagalan autentikasi dengan Google.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text: GET /auth/google/failure

docs.title: Code
docs.text:
app.get("/auth/google/failure", (req, res) => {
    res.status(401).json({
        success: false,
        error: "Google authentication failed.",
    });
});

docs.title: Deskripsi
docs.text: Endpoint ini digunakan untuk logout pengguna dari aplikasi.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text: GET /logout

docs.title: Code
docs.text:
app.get("/logout", (req, res) => {
    req.logout((err) => {
        if (err) {
            return res.status(500).json({ error: "Logout failed" });
        }
        return res.status(200).json({ message: "Logout successful" });
    });
});

Dengan dokumentasi ini, pengguna dapat dengan mudah memahami fungsionalitas dan penggunaan masing-masing endpoint dalam autentikasi OAuth dengan Google menggunakan Passport.

docs.title: Delete
docs.text: Endpoint to delete an existing post. Only the user who created the post can delete it.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text:
DELETE /api/posts/:id

  • Replace :id with the actual post ID.

docs.title: Request
docs.text:
• Parameters:
    • id: The ID of the post to be deleted.

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
• 200 OK:

    • Content-Type: application/json
    • Body: 
      {
    "id": "string"
}

  • 403 Forbidden:

    • Content-Type: application/json
    • Body: 
      {
    "error": "You do not have permission to delete this post."
}

  • 404 Not Found:

    • Content-Type: application/json
    • Body: 
      {
    "error": "Post not found."
}

  • 500 Internal Server Error:

    • Content-Type: application/json
    • Body: 
      {
    "error": "string"
}

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
Request:

DELETE /api/posts/07r719qaQoFIb3L2T5LN

docs.title: GET BY ID
docs.text: Endpoint to retrieve information about a specific post.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text:
GET /api/posts/:id
  • Replace :id with the actual post ID.

docs.title: Request
docs.text:
• Request parameters:
    • id (string): ID of the post to retrieve.

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
• 200 OK:

    • Content-Type: application/json
    • Body: 
      {
    "id": "string",
    "title": "string",
    "location": "string",
    "image": "string",
    "caption": "string",
    "tags": ["string"],
    "create_at": {
        "_seconds": 0,
        "_nanoseconds": 0
    },
    "updateAt": {
        "_seconds": 0,
        "_nanoseconds": 0
    },
    "update_at": {
        "_seconds": 0,
        "_nanoseconds": 0
    },
    "userId": "string"
}

  • 404 Not Found:

    • Content-Type: application/json
    • Body: 
      {
    "message": "string",
    "error": "string"
}

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
Request:

Some code with the http at the start:

Response:

{

    "tags": ["awesome", "cool", "jakarta"],
    "create_at": {
        "_seconds": 1701440700,
        "_nanoseconds": 536000000
    },
    "updateAt": {
        "_seconds": 1702051375,
        "_nanoseconds": 761000000

    "userId": "118235995435385156808"
}

            "image": "string",

            "tags": ["string"],
            "caption": "string",

                "_seconds": 0,
                "_nanoseconds": 0

                "_seconds": 0,
                "_nanoseconds": 0

            "updatedAt": {
                "_seconds": 0,
                "_nanoseconds": 0

                "displayName": "string",
                "email": "string",

docs.title: POST
docs.text: Endpoint to create a new post.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text: POST /api/posts

docs.title: Request
docs.text:
• Headers:

    • Content-Type: multipart/form-data

  • Body:

    • title (string): Title of the post.
    • location (string): Location information for the post.
    • caption (string): Caption for the post.
    • tags (array(string)): Comma-separated tags for the post.
    • image(file): Image file to be uploaded.

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
• 200 OK:

    • Content-Type: application/json
    • Body:
    "postId": "string",
    "data": {
        "id": "string",
        "title": "string",
        "caption": "string",
        "tags": ["string"],
        "image": "string",
        "location": "string",
        "update_at": {
            "_seconds": 0,
            "_nanoseconds": 0
        },
        "create_at": {
            "_seconds": 0,
            "_nanoseconds": 0
        }
    }

  • 500 Internal Server Error:

    • Content-Type: application/json

    • Body:

      {
    "message": "string",
    "error": "string"
}

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
Request:

POST /api/posts
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

title: Candi Borobudur
caption: Borobudur, also transcribed Barabudur is a 9th-century Mahayana Buddhist temple in Magelang Regency, not far from the city of Magelang and the town of Muntilan, in Central Java, Indonesia
tags: cool, awesome, jawa
location: Magelang, Jawa Tengah
file: [binary data]

                "_seconds": 0,

            },
            "updatedAt": {
                "_seconds": 0,

                "displayName": "string",
                "email": "string",

    "error": "string"

docs.title: UPDATE
docs.text: Endpoint to update an existing post. Only the user who created the post can update it.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text:
PUT /api/posts/:id

  • Replace :id with the actual post ID.

docs.title: Request
docs.text:
• Headers:
    • Content-Type: multipart/form-data

  • Parameters:

    • id: The ID of the post to be updated.

  • Body: (at least one of the following)

    • title (string): Updated title of the post.
    • location (string): Updated location information for the post.
    • caption (string): Updated caption for the post.
    • tags (array(string)): Updated comma-separated tags for the post.
    • image(file): Update image file to be uploaded.

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
• 200 OK:

    • Content-Type: application/json

    • Body:

      {
    "message": "Post updated successfully."
}

  • 403 Forbidden:

    • Content-Type: application/json

    • Body:

      {
    "error": "You do not have permission to edit this post."
}

  • 404 Not Found:

    • Content-Type: application/json

    • Body:

      {
    "error": "Post not found."
}

  • 500 Internal Server Error:

    • Content-Type: application/json

    • Body:

      {
    "error": "Trouble server side"
}

docs.title: 200 OK
docs.text:
Response:

{
    "message": "Post updated successfully."
}

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
Request:

PUT /api/posts/07r719qaQoFIb3L2T5LN
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

title: Updated Title
caption: Updated Caption
location: Updated Location
tags: updated, tags
file: [binary data]

docs.title: GET BY ID
docs.text: Endpoint to retrieve information about a specific post.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text:
GET /api/users/:id
  • Replace :id with the actual post ID.

docs.title: Request
docs.text:
• Request parameters:
    • id (string): ID of the post to retrieve.

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
• 200 OK:

    • Content-Type: application/json
    • Body: 
      {
    "id": "utWnXnhpjPEINAuBjQVT",
    "uid": "118235995435385156808",
    "photoURL": "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_gZFdmdWJ_TG7OWLXtWKcB-qmxIBUmnHlDd3Db4XRAg=s96-c",
    "provider": "google",
    "displayName": "shigure yukikaze",
    "verified": true,
    "email": "shigurekawai@gmail.com",
    "posts": [
        "AQogY1wde8NfzlbHOLJP",
        "Bk0aoG76PfdOmPHYmw69",
        "qYyYK388dK5XDA473AfL"
    ]
}

  • 404 Not Found:

    • Content-Type: application/json
    • Body: 
      {
    "message": "Not found User"
}

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
Request:

Some code with the http at the start:

Response:

{
    "id": "07r719qaQoFIb3L2T5LN",
    "uid": "118235995435385156808",
    "title": "Ancol",
    "location": "Jakarta Pusat, Jakarta",
    "caption": "Monas at night",
    "image": "https://storage.googleapis.com/percobaan-dulu-2e8d8.appspot.com/images/1701440700536_marc-x-ducati.jpeg",
    "tags": ["awesome", "cool", "jakarta"],
    "create_at": {
        "_seconds": 1701440700,
        "_nanoseconds": 536000000
    },
    "updateAt": {
        "_seconds": 1702051375,
        "_nanoseconds": 761000000

}

docs.title: Get Users
docs.text: Endpoint to retrieve information about all users.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text: GET /api/users

docs.title: Request
docs.text: No request body is required.

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
• 200 OK:

    • Content-Type: application/json
    • Body:
{
    "users": [
        {
            "uid": "string",
            "displayName": "string",
            "email": "string",
            "photoURL": "string",
            "provider": "string",
            "verified": true,
            "accessToken": "string",
            "posts": ["string"]
        }
    ]
}
  • 500 Internal Server Error:
    • Content-Type: application/json
    • Body: 
      {
    "message": "server error",
    "error": "string"
}

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
Request:

GET /api/users

Response:

{
    "users": [
        {
            "id": "utWnXnhpjPEINAuBjQVT",
            "photoURL": "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_gZFdmdWJ_TG7OWLXtWKcB-qmxIBUmnHlDd3Db4XRAg=s96-c",
            "provider": "google",
            "displayName": "shigure yukikaze",
            "verified": true,
            "email": "shigurekawai@gmail.com",
            "posts": [
                "AQogY1wde8NfzlbHOLJP",
                "Bk0aoG76PfdOmPHYmw69",
                "qYyYK388dK5XDA473AfL"
            ]
        }
    ]
}

Error Response:

{
    "message": "Something Error",
    "error": "Error message details"
}

docs.title: Get Users
docs.text: Endpoint to retrieve information about all users.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text: GET /api/users

docs.title: Request
docs.text: No request body is required.

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
• 200 OK:

            "email": "string",
            "photoURL": "string",
